original_text: And the angel answering said unto him, I am Gabriel, that stand in the presence of God; and am sent to speak unto thee, and to shew thee these glad tidings.
korean_text: 천사가 대답하여 이르되 나는 하나님 앞에 서 있는 가브리엘이라 이 좋은 소식을 전하여 네게 말하라고 보내심을 받았노라

sentences.original_text: And the angel answering said unto him
that stand in the presence of God
and am sent to speak unto thee
and to shew thee these glad tidings
sentences.korean_translation: 이 기쁜 소식을 네게 보이기 위함이라
